mapper.insert: insert into tb_lunch( lunch_name, sale_money, product_cover, inside_banner, graphic_description, is_shelves, is_reservation, reservation_number, inventory_number, have_salenumber, lunch_description, sort, send_integral, createtime, updatetime, category_id ) values ( #{lunch_name}, #{sale_money}, #{product_cover}, #{inside_banner}, #{graphic_description}, #{is_shelves}, #{is_reservation}, #{reservation_number}, #{inventory_number}, #{have_salenumber}, #{lunch_description}, (select ifnull(max(a.sort),'-1')+1 from tb_lunch a where a.category_id=#{category_id} ) , #{send_integral}, now(), now(), #{category_id} )
mapper.update:
update tb_lunch set lunch_name= #{lunch_name}, sale_money= #{sale_money}, product_cover= #{product_cover}, inside_banner= #{inside_banner}, graphic_description= #{graphic_description}, is_shelves= #{is_shelves}, is_reservation= #{is_reservation},
reservation_number= #{reservation_number}, inventory_number= #{inventory_number}, lunch_description= #{lunch_description}, category_id= #{category_id}, send_integral= #{send_integral}, lunch_id = lunch_id where lunch_id = #{lunch_id}
update tb_lunch as g1 join tb_lunch as g2 on (g1.lunch_id=#{lunch_id_one} and g2.lunch_id = #{lunch_id_two}) set g1.sort = g2.sort,g2.sort=g1.sort

update tb_lunch set reservation_number= #{reservation_number}, inventory_number= #{inventory_number}, dc_version= #{dc_version}, yd_version= #{yd_version}, lunch_id=lunch_id where lunch_id = #{lunch_id}
mapper.select: select lunch_id, lunch_name, sale_money, product_cover, inside_banner, graphic_description, is_shelves, is_reservation, reservation_number, inventory_number, have_salenumber, lunch_description, send_integral, createtime, updatetime, category_id from tb_lunch where lunch_id = #{lunch_id}

select a.lunch_id, a.lunch_name, a.sale_money, a.inside_banner, a.is_shelves, ifnull(a.have_salenumber, 0 ) as have_salenumber, b.title from tb_lunch a left join tb_category b on a.category_id=b.category_id
order by a.createtime desc
select cast(a.lunch_id as char) as lunch_id, a.lunch_name, ifnull(a.reservation_number,0) as reservation_number from tb_lunch a where a.is_shelves='1' and a.is_reservation='1'
select cast(a.lunch_id as char) as lunch_id, a.lunch_name, ifnull(a.inventory_number,0) as inventory_number from tb_lunch a where a.is_shelves='1'
select lunch_id, reservation_number, inventory_number, dc_version, yd_version from tb_lunch where lunch_id = #{lunch_id}
select lunch_id, lunch_name, sale_money, inside_banner, graphic_description from tb_lunch where lunch_id = #{lunch_id}

select a.category_id, a.lunch_id, a.lunch_name, a.product_cover, a.inside_banner, a.graphic_description, a.sale_money, a.inventory_number, ifnull(a.reservation_number , '0') as reservation_number, IFNULL(a.send_integral,0) as send_integral, (a.sale_money-IFNULL(a.send_integral,0)) as daoshoumoney from tb_lunch a where a.category_id=#{category_id} and a.is_shelves='1'
and a.is_reservation='1'
order by a.sort
